name: Thai Basil Beef
description: A speedy, savory Thai beef basil stir fry that’s just a bit spicy and really hits the spot.

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl combine chili paste, soy sauce, fish sauce, brown sugar and lime juice until incorporated, set aside.Heat oil in a large skillet set over medium high heat

Add the ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up with a spoon and stirring often, about 6 minutes.Add the bell pepper, onion and garlic to the beef and cook until vegetables start to soften, about 5 minutes
Pour the sauce mixture along with the fresh basil (reserving a fresh few leaves for the top) and continue cooking until basil starts to wilt
Serve over rice topped with fresh basil and fresh cilantro

recipeIngredient: 2 tbsp olive oil or vegetable oil
1 cup loosely packed fresh basil leaves, divided
2 tbsp soy sauce (or tamari for gluten free alternative)
